snippet: Many developers and affordable-housing advocates said they feared that the rule changes could make it much more difficult for projects to be built in cities.

byline.original: By EMILY RAMSHAW and RUDOLPH BUSH

lead_paragraph: Many developers and affordable-housing advocates said they feared that the rule changes could make it much more difficult for projects to be built in cities.

headline.seo: Texas’ New Tax-Subsidy Rules Bode Ill for Affordable Housing in Low-Income Areas
headline.main: Tax-Subsidy Rules Bode Ill for Affordable Housing in Low-Income Areas
headline.print_headline: Tax-Subsidy Rules Bode Ill for Affordable Housing in Low-Income Areas
